origin.ddvorigins.vai.name: Vai
origin.ddvorigins.vai.description: The Vai Race is one of mystery. They bear incredibly strong minds, bending the known logics of physics.
power.ddvorigins.vai/vaision.name: Vaision
power.ddvorigins.vai/vaision.description: Your intrepid sense of vision allows you to see weaker entities through walls, by highlighting them with a glow only visible to you.
power.ddvorigins.vai/atomrelocate.name: Atomic Relocation
power.ddvorigins.vai/atomrelocate.descri: You can relocate your body particles to a location ahead of you.
death.attack.vai_relocated_into: %s was torn apart by a Vai relocating into them
death.attack.vai_relocated_into.player: %s was torn apart by %s relocating into them
power.ddvorigins.vai/chronokinesis.name: Chronokinesis
power.ddvorigins.vai/chronokinesis.descr: You bend spacetime, creating a loop that gives you immense strength for a limited time, before warping you back to the start of your loop.
death.attack.vai_time: Time was not so kind to %s
death.attack.vai_time.entity: Time was not so kind to %s after being attacked by %s
power.ddvorigins.vai/unnatural.name: Unnaturality
power.ddvorigins.vai/unnatural.descripti: The forces of nature are against you, hunting you down before you cause any damage to the world. As such, you can only rest when deep underground.
ddvorigins.vai.cant_sleep: Its too dangerous to rest here..
power.ddvorigins.vai/halfsoul.name: Half-Soul
power.ddvorigins.vai/halfsoul.descriptio: Due to unnatural occurrences within your biological system, you have half your max health.
